name: CourseModules
descriptionHtml:
### Endpoint for getting list of modules created

Request:

GET - https://apiqa.inquitech.in/api/v1/courseModules

Response:

200 - OK 

  {"status":200,"status_type":"success","message":"OK","count":1,"data":[{"totalItems":20,"dataValues":[{"course_module_id":1,"course_id":1,"title":"Inspiration","description":"Welcome to the First step in your Problem Solving Journey.
Do you want to make a difference in the world around you but are not sure how?
Then watch the story of our Problem Solvers: Adila, Aryn, Shama and Amir.
What inspired them to be Problem Solvers? Let us see and get inspired too!","status":"ACTIVE","created_by":1,"created_at":null,"updated_by":1,"updated_at":null},{"course_module_id":2,"course_id":1,"title":"Me and Us","description":"Congrulations on the start of your Journey. 
Do you know what makes a great team? 
Let's find out what Aryn's teacher has to say about it. ","status":"ACTIVE","created_by":65,"created_at":null,"updated_by":65,"updated_at":"2022-09-09T10:24:53.000Z"},{"course_module_id":3,"course_id":1,"title":"Feel & Find","description":"Phew! Just like Amir and his team, you too have a strong team of Problem Solvers.
But you know, Amir and his team are confused how to Find problems in their community. 
I am sure you too must be wondering.
Farah and their teacher helped them out. But who is Farah?
Let's find out!  ","status":"ACTIVE","created_by":1,"created_at":null,"updated_by":1,"updated_at":null},{"course_module_id":4,"course_id":1,"title":"Explore","description":"Are you ready with your choosen Problem?
Remember? Shama and team too have choosen a problem to solve.
But do they know enough about the probelm they identified?
Let us see how they Explored the problem deeper to understand it better!","status":"ACTIVE","created_by":1,"created_at":null,"updated_by":1,"updated_at":null},{"course_module_id":5,"course_id":1,"title":"Give Ideas","description":"Give yourself a pat on your back for completing more than half of the Problem Solving Journey.
You are a Star. The Journey ahead is full of Fun and Learnings.
Ideas! Ideas! Ideas!
Let's see how Aryn and team came up with them and learn from them how to Give Ideas!","status":"ACTIVE","created_by":1,"created_at":null,"updated_by":1,"updated_at":null},{"course_module_id":6,"course_id":1,"title":"Make & Test","description":"Now Comes the most exciting step in your Problem Solving Journey: Make your Idea Real.
Are you excited to see how Adila and team did that? 
We are excited too, to tell you their story!
So, why wait? Let's watch and learn!","status":"ACTIVE","created_by":1,"created_at":null,"updated_by":1,"updated_at":null},{"course_module_id":7,"course_id":1,"title":"Conclusion","description":"Once a Problem Solver, Always a Problem Solver!
A huge Hi-fi from us to the Problem Solver in you.
We have just one more thing to tell you. Please
